title: 聖誕節想去旅行，最好過埋年，有無咩地方好推介？

replies.msg: 因為budget有限，10000數內，所以歐遊唔到，有無咩心水地方介紹下

香港街頭
長期要人
多你一個差好遠

東南亞任何國家都應該得。

主要機票唔太貴。

日/韓嘅話，除非你避開最貴日子出發同回程，否則機票唔見好多。

Going to Hokkaido on vacation over the Christmas holidays is a good bet since the japanese yen has fallen dramatically. I enjoy visiting the annual winter carnival on Christmas eve where I go on the thrill rides and eat sushi soaking up the nice christmassy atmosphere. The sunlight has been dazzlingly hot all week so you might just as well have a good long soak in an outdoor onsen soaking up the sun. In fact I've just got out of an onsen am and drying myself on a towel.
